title: A  Question About Queuing With Preferred Roles.

replies.body: The system does take your first preference into account, but keep in mind that Mid is one of the most played roles. You might just be getting unlucky with which roles you're getting.

Unlucky? Well then I must be EXTREMELY unlucky, because as I continue to play the percentage is not evening out, it's consistently staying around 80-90%, not to mention that sometimes I don't even wait out the estimated queue time and still only get my secondary. Of course I know that Mid is popular, but the numbers are uncanny
